aboutMe.headline: Über mich
aboutMe.hello: Hi! Mein Name ist Felix. Ich bin ein leidenschaftlicher Frontend-Entwickler aus Hamburg. Schön, dass Sie den Weg hierher gefunden haben.

portfolio.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.polloLoco: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to collect coins and salsa bottles to fight the killer chicken.
portfolio.pokedex: Based on the Poke-API. A simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
